body:
This hopefully is a really simple problem and i'm just a nub but I put in my correct username and password, hit 'Log In' and bam! Error.

I did the usual stuff including: re-installing Java, re-installing Minecraft & punching my computer rather rapidly and still got the same error. Simple fix anyone? I can't play Minecraft until this is fixed :/
body_tagged:

title: Unable to login to Minecraft :(

replies.body: Did you check you wifi? Cuz in the error it clearly says that they couldn't connect to the servers, which you need wifi for.
replies.body_tagged: Did you check you wifi? Cuz in the error it clearly says that they couldn't connect to the servers, which you need wifi for.

replies.body: Your parents probably did something to your wifi like parental controls n stuff? It has to be something with wifi
replies.body_tagged: Your parents probably did something to your wifi like parental controls n stuff? It has to be something with wifi

replies.body: It works on my laggy ass mac so I wouldn't expect it to be the wifi as its using the same router.
replies.body_tagged: It works on my laggy ass mac so I wouldn't expect it to be the wifi as its using the same router.

replies.body: Maybe you accedently blocked mine crafts site?Or did something else to it.
replies.body_tagged: Maybe you accedently blocked mine crafts site?Or did something else to it.

replies.body: But I you see the error, the the thing says it's your wifi! Just hit the reset button on your wifi router, then try.
replies.body_tagged: But I you see the error, the the thing says it's your wifi! Just hit the reset button on your wifi router, then try.

Edit: no change :/ unfortunatly

replies.body:
Well I recon my wifi isn't out... Otherwise avicus.net wouldn't work
I might need to change host or something IDK

replies.body: did you restart you computer
replies.body_tagged: did you restart you computer

replies.body: Yeah, try that. ^

replies.body: I first smash my laptop a few times. If that doesn't get it working I just turn it on and off again.
replies.body_tagged: I first smash my laptop a few times. If that doesn't get it working I just turn it on and off again.

replies.body: log onto minecraft.net, if you can't, reset your password with your email, then take the new password and log in to the launcher. hopefully it works then ^_^
replies.body_tagged: log onto minecraft.net, if you can't, reset your password with your email, then take the new password and log in to the launcher. hopefully it works then ^_^

replies.body:
@benconsolver I have restarted my computer a few times

@TheRomanTrident I changed my password and tried to log in to Minecraft again and got the same error

replies.body:
If your account is migrated, try using the e-mail to login.
If it isn't that, then I really don't know your problem :(
replies.body_tagged:
If your account is migrated, try using the e-mail to login.
If it isn't that, then I really don't know your problem :(

replies.body: Have you tried your email, maybe that will work!
replies.body_tagged: Have you tried your email, maybe that will work!

replies.body: My account has been migrated for around 6 months and I log in using my email address.
replies.body_tagged: My account has been migrated for around 6 months and I log in using my email address.

replies.body: Send an email to support@mojang.net and tell them your account conformation code. Then tell them to reset your password.
replies.body_tagged: Send an email to support@mojang.net and tell them your account conformation code. Then tell them to reset your password.

replies.body:
Captain, are you certain you used your email? the right email? Because from the screenie you provided... it seems it expired, probably from the migration, and you stated in your 1st post, that you put in the user, not the email.
Also, to add to dodger's post, since you have already tried resetting your password, and if what I said above fails... submit an email to support@mojang.net about this. (not resetting, since u already have)
replies.body_tagged:
Captain, are you certain you used your email? the right email? Because from the screenie you provided... it seems it expired, probably from the migration, and you stated in your 1st post, that you put in the user, not the email.
Also, to add to dodger's post, since you have already tried resetting your password, and if what I said above fails... submit an email to support@mojang.net about this. (not resetting, since u already have)

replies.body:
I will send an email to support@mojang.net thanks for the idea :) I will get back with the results in the 2 weeks it will probably take to get a reply.

@TheRomanTrident I can log in fine on my really laggy laptop using the exact same credentials but not on my gaming PC. (and its using the same wifi connection)
